name: Derrick Harmon

draftPick2025.scoutingReport: Falcons address the defensive interior. With longtime DT Grady Jarrett now in Chicago, Harmon brings youth and energy to Atlanta's D-line:contentReference[oaicite:123]{index=123}. A stout run defender with upside as a pass rusher, he fits the Falcons' need for trench toughness.
